pr_title: [DOCS] Adds empty snapshot_id description to revert snapshot API docs

timeline.message: [DOCS] Adds a note about empty snapshot_id to revert snapshot API docs.

timeline.bodyText: Text looks good but it should move from the get-snapshot docs to the revert-snapshot docs.
timeline.author: dimitris-athanasiou
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -38,8 +40,12 @@ You can multiple snapshots for a single job in a single API request
 by using a comma-separated list of `<snapshot_id>` or a wildcard expression.
 You can get all snapshots for all calendars by using `_all`,
 by specifying `*` as the `<snapshot_id>`, or by omitting the `<snapshot_id>`.
+You can also specify `empty` as the <snapshot_id>. Revert to `empty` results in

timeline.message: [DOCS] Adds text to revert, removes from get.
